multidimensional.heading: Multidimensional
multidimensional.text: A table with two dimensions, locked first column when scrolling and an indicator showing the user where they are horizontally. This also makes the first column is also collapsible.

filterable.heading: A filterable table
filterable.text: Renders a searchbar above the table for realtime filtering.

sortable.heading: Sortable columns
sortable.text: Makes it possible to  sort each column by clicking the headers.

sum.heading: Sum row
sum.text: Renders a row at the bottom of the table showing the sum of each cell in corresponding column.

pagination.heading: Pagination
pagination.text: Renders pagination buttons below the table. Set the value to the max rows per page.

fullscreen.heading: Fullscreen
fullscreen.text: Renders an icon in the top right corner, that when clicked opens up the table in fullscreen.
